snippet.title: Cloudburst for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

???


Game description:

You are "Chip" Montana, an intergalactic mercenary, sent to destroy the evil cloud people.

Dodge acid rain drops, flaming-hot hailstones and cloud hoppers.


What I think:

Somewhat repetitive, but the intense action, even on the beginner level, makes up for it.

Overall an okay game.
